1: -module(hty_inte_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: 
    4: 
    5: -export([accesslog_check_request_logged/1]).
    6: -export([catch_forward/1]).
    7: -export([history_empty/1,
    8:       history_unparsable_body/1,
    9:       history_post_and_reread/1,
   10:       history_get_latest/1,
   11:       history_get_earlier/1,
   12:       history_expect_conflict/1]).
   13: -export([move_file/1,
   14:         move_folder/1]).
   15: -export([static_get_rootfile/1,
   16:         static_get_subfile/1,
   17:         static_index_txt_welcome/1,
   18:         static_get_rootindex/1,
   19:         static_get_subindex/1]).
   20: -export([staticlisting_list_root/1,
   21:         staticlisting_list_sub/1,
   22:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile/1]).
   23: -export([vhosts_basic/1,
   24:       vhosts_subdomains/1]).
   25: -export([xslpi_basic/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include("hty_test.hrl").
   28: 
   29: all() -> [
   30:     {group, accesslog},
   31:     {group, 'catch'},
   32:     {group, move},
   33:     {group, history},
   34:     {group, static},
   35:     {group, staticlisting},
   36:     {group, vhosts},
   37:     {group, xslpi}
   38: ].
   39: 
   40: groups() -> [
   41:     {accesslog, [
   42:       accesslog_check_request_logged
   43:     ]},
   44:     {'catch', [
   45:         catch_forward
   46:     ]},
   47:     {history, [
   48:       history_empty,
   49:       history_unparsable_body,
   50:       history_post_and_reread,
   51:       history_get_latest,
   52:       history_get_earlier,
   53:       history_expect_conflict
   54:     ]},
   55:     {move, [
   56:         move_file,
   57:         move_folder
   58:     ]},
   59:     {static, [
   60:         static_get_rootfile,
   61:         static_get_subfile,
   62:         static_index_txt_welcome,
   63:         static_get_rootindex,
   64:         static_get_subindex
   65:     ]},
   66:     {staticlisting, [
   67:         staticlisting_list_root,
   68:         staticlisting_list_sub,
   69:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile
   70:     ]},
   71:     {vhosts, [
   72:       vhosts_basic,
   73:       vhosts_subdomains
   74:     ]},
   75:     {xslpi, [
   76:       xslpi_basic
   77:     ]}
   78: ].
   79: 
   80: 
   81: 
   82: catch_forward(Config) ->
   83:   run_test(#exchange{
   84:     url = "http://localhost:1029/helloworld.html",
   85:     rsp_headers = [
   86:         {"content-type", "text/html"}
   87:     ],
   88:     rsp_file = "facit.html"
   89:   }, Config).
   90: 
   91: static_get_rootfile(Config) ->
   92:     run_test(#exchange{
   93:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/rootfile.html",
   94:                 rsp_headers = [
   95:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
   96:                 ],
   97:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
   98:             },
   99:             Config).
  100: 
  101: static_get_subfile(Config) ->
  102:     run_test(#exchange{
  103:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder/subfile.html",
  104:                 rsp_headers = [
  105:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  106:                 ],
  107:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  108:             },
  109:             Config).
  110: 
  111: static_index_txt_welcome(Config) ->
  112:     run_test(#exchange{
  113:               url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolderwithtextindex/",
  114:               rsp_headers = [
  115:                   {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  116:               ],
  117:               rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  118:             },
  119:             Config).
  120: 
  121: static_get_rootindex(Config) ->
  122:   run_test(#exchange{
  123:             url = "http://localhost:1031/",
  124:             rsp_headers = [
  125:                 {"content-type", "text/html"}
  126:             ],
  127:             rsp_file = "facit.html"
  128:           },
  129:           Config).
  130: 
  131: static_get_subindex(Config) ->
  132:   run_test(#exchange{
  133:           url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder",
  134:           rsp_headers = [
  135:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  136:           ],
  137:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  138:         },
  139:         Config).
  140: 
  141: staticlisting_list_root(Config) ->
  142:   run_test(#exchange{
  143:           url = "http://localhost:1032/",
  144:           rsp_headers = [
  145:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  146:           ],
  147:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  148:           entity_compare = trimmed
  149:         },
  150:         Config).
  151: 
  152: staticlisting_list_sub(Config) ->
  153:   run_test(#exchange{
  154:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/",
  155:           rsp_headers = [
  156:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  157:           ],
  158:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  159:           entity_compare = trimmed
  160:         },
  161:         Config).
  162: 
  163: staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile(Config) ->
  164:   run_test(#exchange{
  165:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/index.html",
  166:           rsp_headers = [
  167:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  168:           ],
  169:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  170:         },
  171:         Config).
  172: 
  173: xslpi_basic(Config) ->
  174:   run_test(#exchange{
  175:     url = "http://localhost:1030/docs/resource.xml",
  176:     rsp_headers = [
  177:       {"content-type", "text/xml"}
  178:     ],
  179:     rsp_file = "facit.xml"
  180:     },
  181:     Config).
  182: 
  183: accesslog_check_request_logged(Cfg) -> run_test([
  184:   #exchange{
  185:     url = "http://localhost:1028/helloworld.txt",
  186:     rsp_headers = [
  187:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  188:     ],
  189:     rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  190:   },
  191:   #exchange{
  192:     url = "http://localhost:1028/logs",
  193:     rsp_headers = [
  194:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  195:     ],
  196:     rsp_pattern = "^.*|GET /helloworld.txt| .* 200"
  197:     }
  198:   ], Cfg).
  199:   
  200:   
  201: move_file(Cfg) -> run_test([
  202:     #exchange{
  203:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  204:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  205:     },
  206:     #exchange{
  207:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  208:         status = 404
  209:     },
  210:     #exchange{
  211:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  212:         method = delete,
  213:         req_headers = [
  214:             {"destination", "newname"},
  215:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  216:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  217:         ],
  218:         rsp_headers = [
  219:             {"location", "newname"}
  220:         ]
  221:     },
  222:     #exchange{
  223:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  224:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  225:     },
  226:     #exchange{
  227:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  228:         status = 404
  229:     }], Cfg).
  230:     
  231: move_folder(Cfg) -> run_test([
  232:     #exchange{
  233:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  234:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  235:     },
  236:     #exchange{
  237:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  238:         status = 404
  239:     },
  240:     #exchange{
  241:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  242:         method = delete,
  243:         req_headers = [
  244:             {"destination", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"},
  245:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  246:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  247:         ],
  248:         rsp_headers = [
  249:             {"location", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"}
  250:         ]
  251:     },
  252:     #exchange{
  253:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  254:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  255:     },
  256:     #exchange{
  257:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  258:         status = 404
  259:     }], Cfg).
  260: 
  261: history_unparsable_body(Cfg) ->
  262:   run_test(
  263:     #exchange{
  264:       method = post,
  265:       url = "http://localhost:1033/unparsable.xml",
  266:       status = 400,
  267:       req_headers = [
  268:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  269:       ],
  270:       req_body = <<"[=root&\"=lite_text&]=annan_root">>
  271:     }
  272:   ,Cfg).
  273: 
  274: history_get_latest(Cfg) -> run_test([
  275:   #exchange{
  276:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  277:     method = post,
  278:     req_headers = [
  279:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  280:     ],
  281:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  282:   },
  283:   #exchange{
  284:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  285:     method = post,
  286:     req_headers = [
  287:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  288:     ],
  289:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  290:   },
  291:   #exchange{
  292:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  293:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  294:     entity_compare = trimmed
  295:   }
  296:   ], Cfg).
  297: 
  298: 
  299: history_get_earlier(Cfg) -> run_test([
  300:   #exchange{
  301:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  302:     method = post,
  303:     req_headers = [
  304:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  305:     ],
  306:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  307:   },
  308:   #exchange{
  309:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  310:     method = post,
  311:     req_headers = [
  312:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  313:     ],
  314:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  315:   },
  316:   #exchange{
  317:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml;rev=0",
  318:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>orangutang</apa></apor>",
  319:     entity_compare = trimmed
  320:   }
  321: ], Cfg).
  322: 
  323: history_expect_conflict(Cfg) -> run_test([
  324:   #exchange{
  325:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  326:     method = post,
  327:     req_headers = [
  328:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  329:     ],
  330:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  331:   },
  332:   #exchange{
  333:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  334:     method = post,
  335:     req_headers = [
  336:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  337:     ],
  338:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  339:   },
  340:   #exchange{
  341:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  342:     method = post,
  343:     req_headers = [
  344:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  345:     ],
  346:     status = 409,
  347:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=gorilla&]=apa&]=apor"
  348:   },
  349:   #exchange{
  350:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  351:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  352:     entity_compare = trimmed
  353:   }
  354: ], Cfg).
  355: 
  356: history_post_and_reread(Cfg) ->
  357:   run_test([
  358:     #exchange{
  359:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  360:       method = post,
  361:       req_headers = [
  362:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  363:       ],
  364:       req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  365:     },
  366:     #exchange{
  367:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  368:       rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  369:       entity_compare = trimmed
  370:     }
  371:   ], Cfg).
  372: 
  373: history_empty(Config) ->
  374:   run_test(#exchange{
  375:     url = "http://localhost:1033/finns_inte.xml",
  376:     status = 404
  377:   }, Config).
  378: 
  379: vhosts_basic(Cfg) ->
  380:   run_test([#exchange{
  381:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  382:         req_headers = [
  383:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  384:           {"host", "orangutang"}
  385:         ],
  386:         status = 200,
  387:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  388:   }, #exchange{
  389:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  390:         req_headers = [
  391:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  392:           {"host", "schimpans"}
  393:         ],
  394:         status = 200,
  395:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  396:   }], Cfg).
  397: 
  398:   vhosts_subdomains(Cfg) ->
  399:     run_test([#exchange{
  400:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  401:           req_headers = [
  402:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  403:             {"host", "orangutang.jenspersson.com"}
  404:           ],
  405:           status = 200,
  406:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  407:     }, #exchange{
  408:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  409:           req_headers = [
  410:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  411:             {"host", "schimpans.jenspersson.com"}
  412:           ],
  413:           status = 200,
  414:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  415:     }], Cfg).
  416:
